narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Re-License inspection. 
 
This is a 2nd Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with a facility 
representative. The applicant is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
 
A copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional action on your part. If you have not received your license 
within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478.
